text: Princess Alexandra, The Honourable Lady Ogilvy LG GCVO CD (Alexandra Helen Elizabeth Olga Christabel; born 25 December 1936), is a member of the British Royal Family, the youngest granddaughter of King George V and Queen Mary. She had two children, Marina and James Ogilvy with Sir Angus Ogilvy. She is 55th in line for the Throne as of February 2023. ==Titles and Styles== 25 December 1936-24 April 1963: Her Royal Highness Princess Alexandra of Kent 24 April 1963-31 December 1988: Her Royal Highness Princess Alexandra, The Honorable Mrs Ogilvy 31 December 1988-present: Her Royal Highness Princess Alexandra, The Honorable Lady Ogilvy ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:House of Windsor Category:British princesses Category:Knights of the Garter Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
title: Princess Alexandra, The Honourable Lady Ogilvy
